name: df-btwn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cbtwn, ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wrex(s3, cn, wa(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cee, cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cee, cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cee, cv(s3)))), wrex(s4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wral(s5, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s5)), co(co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(s4)), cmul, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s5))), caddc, co(cv(s4), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s5))))))))))))
comment: Define the Euclidean betweenness predicate. For details, see ~ brbtwn . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jun-2013.)
